quests.name: The Housewarming
objectives:
Gather materials to fix Rapunzel's Tower:
  ‧ 4 Zinc.
  ‧ 4 Tin.
  ‧ 30 Soil.
Return to Rapunzel's Tower to repair the door.

Use the Hourglass to search for Rapunzel's treasures in the following locations:
  ‧ Wall Clock near the Docks.
  ‧ Cast-Iron Pan near the Oasis.
  ‧ Handheld Lantern near the Grasslands.
  ‧ Purple Cushion near the Promenade.
Investigate Rapunzel's painting in your Inventory.

Return Rapunzel's treasures to their places.
  ‧ Cast Iron Pan.
  ‧ Handheld Lantern.
  ‧ Purple Pillow.
  ‧ Wall Clock.
Be a good neighbor to the capybaras.

Gather materials for their new home:
  ‧ 10 Bamboo.
  ‧ 15 Tropical Wood.
  ‧ 1 Spinel.
  ‧ 3 Green Glass-Like Flowers.
Place the Tropical Companion Home anywhere in the jungle.

quests.name: I've Got a Dreamlight
objectives: Find the Ingredients for the Ruby Masoor Dal and cook it.
Bring the Ruby Masoor Dal to Remy.
Make sure you have the Ruby Masoor Dal in your Inventory.
Share the Ruby Masoor Dal with Rapunzel.

Gather materials for Rapunzel's creature:
  ‧ 10 Softwood.
  ‧ 10 Plastic Scrap.
  ‧ 2 Scorpion.
  ‧ 3 Piranha.
Return to Rapunzel's Tower to give her the materials.

Make sure you have the materials in your Inventory.
  ‧ 10 Softwood.
  ‧ 10 Plastic Scrap.
  ‧ 2 Scorpion.
  ‧ 3 Piranha.
Bring the materials to Rapunzel in her tower.
Take a picture of Gaston and the creature.
*sigh* ... Take ANOTHER picture of Gaston and the creature.
Throw the coin in the water... Make a wish!

quests.name: Glowing Up
objectives: Investigate the Old Isle Map in your Inventory.

Using the map, search Eternity Isle to find the Sundrop Petals with your Hourglass.
  ‧ 4 Sundrop Petal.
Bring the petals to someone skilled with magic.

Ask for magical help from:
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ Ursula.

Gather these materials:
  ‧ 5 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 3 Evergem.
  ‧ 8 Skeleton Fish.

Make sure you have Eternal Sundrop Charm in your Inventory.
  ‧ Eternal Sundrop Charm.
Bring the Eternal Sundrop Charm to Rapunzel.

Decorate a campsite area in the Jungle.
  ‧ 1 Cozy Fire Pit.
  ‧ 2 Purple Seating.
  ‧ 4 Decorative Lighting.
  ‧ 3 Rustic Decorations.
Go to the campsite you decorated with Rapunzel.

quests.name: Home is Where the Art Is
objectives: Place Rapunzel's banner somewhere on Eternity Isle for everyone to see.

Gather paint materials for Rapunzel:
  ‧ 4 Bumblestone.
  ‧ 6 Green Glass-Like Flowers.
  ‧ 6 Red Luminescent Flower.
  ‧ 6 Pink Cactus Flower.
  ‧ 10 Amber.
  ‧ 8 Cosmic Figs.
Go to Rapunzel's Tower to start the art class.

Talk to each Villager about their art. Except EVE... she needs more time.
  ‧ Simba.
  ‧ Mirabel.

Hang up your new art in your House.
  ‧ (Be sure to decorate it with the Touch of Magic tool and your new motifs first!)

quests.name: Rapunzel's Challenge
objectives:
Talk with Rapunzel.
  ‧ Cook three colorful meals
  ‧ Blueberry Pie
  ‧ Barbecued Pretty Pink Starfish
  ‧ Ruby Masoor Dal
